price: 11. Yalli woo ayro sitta ken yaybulleeh, sitta yaaxigeeniih sittah xiqaanam malón, tokkel umeyni (korosta kinnuk) isi nafsik isi xaylo fidah yaceem faxaah sangeela Qhiyaamah ayroh digaalak.
arabic: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمۡۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُ لَوۡ يَفۡتَدِي مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِئِذِۭ بِبَنِيهِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
